hero_sub_2: Veridian AI translates your tickets in real-time, automatically responds to your users and manages your support — in all languages.
section_features_sub: A bot designed for international servers that want professional-quality support.
feature_tickets_desc: Complete ticket system with automatic private channel creation, staff assignment, and AI transcription on closure.
feature_translation_desc: Your users write in their language, staff responds in theirs. The bot automatically translates both ways via AI.
feature_support_desc: The bot automatically answers frequently asked questions in designated channels, in each user's language.
feature_fallback_desc: 4 Groq API keys rotating automatically. If one runs out, the next takes over without service interruption.
feature_dashboard_desc: Manage everything from your browser. Discord OAuth2 login, bot configuration, tickets, knowledge base and statistics.
feature_cache_desc: Frequent translations are cached in the database. Instant responses and reduced API costs for your server.
section_how_sub: From user message to resolution, Veridian AI handles everything automatically.
step_1_desc: The user clicks a button or types /ticket, in their language.
step_2_desc: The bot detects the language and sets up the bidirectional translation channel.
step_3_desc: Every message is translated in real-time. Staff and user each speak their own language.
step_4_desc: On closure, the AI generates a complete transcript and summary of the ticket.
section_pricing_sub: Upgrade to a higher plan as your community grows.
plan_free_desc: To test Veridian AI on your server.
plan_premium_desc: For active communities with international support.
plan_pro_desc: For high-volume servers with advanced needs.
payments_sub: Automatic crypto, PayPal or gift cards — we accept everything.
